job_history.work_description: Knowledge and use of Operational Equipment Efficiency (OEE) in PCB manufacturing environment. Expertise and proficiency in LEAN Manufacturing and Six Sigma Methodologies to identify direct and analyze machine group cells for Printed Circuit Board (PCB) and electromechanical components.

Developed, updated and maintained SOPs, Client Guidelines, HR and Technical Manuals and Protocols for Insight Company Managed professionally 14 employees for Insight Quality Services Asian operations and accountable for implementation of strategic objectives, developing operations strategy, planning production services and client communication
Actively suggested operational improvements to enhance quality, improve production times and reduce costs. Helped achieve company goals by supporting production workers.
Successfully trained 54 personnel in QA protocols, equipment maintenance, MSDS and SOPs for Fuels evolutions. Effective decision-maker in high-pressure environments.

skills.name: LEAN Manufacturing
skills.explanation: Demonstrated expertise and proficiency in LEAN Manufacturing methodologies, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Six Sigma Methodologies
skills.explanation: Utilized Six Sigma Methodologies to analyze machine group cells, suggesting strong proficiency.

skills.name: Operational Efficiency
skills.explanation: Applied knowledge of Operational Equipment Efficiency (OEE) in PCB manufacturing environment, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Managed 14 employees and implemented strategic objectives, demonstrating strong leadership skills.

skills.name: Quality Assurance
skills.explanation: Trained personnel in QA protocols and helped achieve company goals, suggesting strong proficiency in quality assurance.

skills.name: Project Management
skills.explanation: Developed and maintained SOPs, Client Guidelines, HR and Technical Manuals and Protocols, indicating solid working proficiency in project management.

skills.name: Communication
skills.explanation: Effectively communicated with production workers and clients, demonstrating solid working proficiency in communication.

skills.name: Problem-Solving
skills.explanation: Suggested operational improvements and made effective decisions in high-pressure environments, indicating solid working proficiency in problem-solving.
